generated_doNotEdit.title: Guardian Attack Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to use a laser beam attack. Can only be used by Guardians and Elder Guardians.

fields.title: Elder Extra Magic Damage
fields.description: Amount of additional damage dealt from an elder guardian's magic attack.

fields.title: Hard Mode Extra Magic Damage
fields.description: In hard difficulty, amount of additional damage dealt from a guardian's magic attack.

fields.title: Magic Damage
fields.description: Amount of damage dealt from a guardian's magic attack. Magic attack damage is added to the guardian's base attack damage.

fields.title: Min Distance
fields.description: Guardian attack behavior stops if the target is closer than this distance (doesn't apply to elders).

fields.title: Sound Delay Time
fields.description: Time (in seconds) to wait after starting an attack before playing the guardian attack sound.

fields.title: x Max Rotation
fields.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

fields.title: y Max Head Rotation
fields.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
